meanings.definition: A rough or unfinished drawing or painting, often done as a preliminary study.
meanings.sent1: During art class, we practiced sketching simple shapes.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys sketching landscapes in her free time.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried sketching with its tail in the spilled milk.
meanings.sent4: His memory was like a sketching, capturing only the basic outlines.
meanings.sent5: The sketching of the tree was so detailed, it looked almost real.

meanings.definition: The act of making a rough or unfinished drawing or painting.
meanings.sent1: The sketching of the model took hours to complete.
meanings.sent2: He found relaxation in the simple act of sketching.
meanings.sent3: The sketching of the clown made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a constant sketching of ideas waiting to be painted.
meanings.sent5: The sketching of the flower captured its beauty perfectly.
